Archimedes Principle _ Lucky Sir

Notion
Archimedes Principle _ Lucky Sir
Buoyant Force
If there is any fluid beneath the body then the buoyant forces are acting upwards.
If there is no fluid beneath the body, then buoyant force acts downwards
For solving questions on buoyant forces our first approach should be by pressure differences.
23/12/2020
Q: What is the force acting on the lower half of the sphere
Q: Find the net upwards force acting on the CSA
Concept of Flotation
Q: A fraud jeweler makes a gold ornament by mixing copper with it. When this ornament is weighed in air its mass comes out to be 36 grams. When this ornament is immersed in water, its mass comes out to be 32 grams. Find the volume of copper and gold given specific gravity of Cu is 1.2 and specific gravity of Au is 1.6
